name: Catball
description:
Roll, Bounce and Slide the cat through each puzzle using a variety of items and props.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.catflap.catball

FEATURES:

● Simple and fun gameplay
● Unique worlds, each introducing new and exciting challenges.
● Stars to collect. Can you get them all?
● A variety of items and props to use in whatever way necessary
● Google Play achievements
● Facebook Integration
● Twitter Integration
● Share your profile with your friends

COMING SOON:

● Timed Runs (Leaderboards)
● Extra Challenges

DEVELOPER INFO:

This game was my first solo mobile game and was created in my spare time outside of my full-time job as a personal project. I'll be looking to collaborate with other people for future projects so if you want to join forces contact me on my twitter :) @_adamturnbull.

FEEDBACK

If you have any feedback, questions or just fancy a good ol' chat feel free to contact me directly on twitter -
